dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3912522N] Notification of Trademark Infraction Ohio Savings Bank at
dmca.body:
T -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2007 11:21 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3912522N] Notification of Trademark Infraction Ohio Savings Bank at http://www.1-mortgage-now.com/go/floridamortgageloan [IFID:97NLD] ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Notification of Trademark Infraction Ohio Savings Bank at http://www.1-mortgage-now.com/go/floridamortgageloan [IFID:97NLD] Added by system at Wednesday, May 2 2007 03:53 pm X-MailFrom: administrator-111@legal-notification.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed May 2 15:53:37 2007 Received: (qmail 22261 invoked by alias); 2 May 2007 20:53:37 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 22258 invoked from network); 2 May 2007 20:53:37 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) (172.16.220.10) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 2 May 2007 20:53:37 -0000 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.102]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 2 May 2007 15:53:37 -0500 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 2 May 2007 15:53:37 -0500 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1178139211-20982-688-2 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from thejimburkefamily.com (unknown [72.14.163.86]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 1027383C35 for ; Wed, 2 May 2007 15:53:36 -0500 (CDT) Received: from BDWEBSVR1 ([10.1.0.80]) by thejimburkefamily.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 2 May 2007 16:52:15 -0400 Reply-To: "Legal Administrator" From: "Legal Administrator" To: X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Notification of Trademark Infraction Ohio Savings Bank at http://www.1-mortgage-now.com/go/floridamortgageloan [IFID:97NLD] Subject: Notification of Trademark Infraction Ohio Savings Bank at http://www.1-mortgage-now.com/go/floridamortgageloan [IFID:97NLD] Date: Wed, 2 May 2007 16:52:15 -0400 Message-ID: <111601c78cfb$c3fb6160$5000010a@affsys.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_1117_01C78CDA.3CE9C160" X-Mailer: Microsoft CDO for Windows 2000 Thread-Index: AceM+8P7SKBw3mzoRhaEoh2Ya3VprQ== Content-Class: urn:content-classes:message X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2800.1896 X-OriginalArrivalTime: 02 May 2007 20:52:15.0475 (UTC) FILETIME=[C3E76430:01C78CFB] X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: administrator-111@legal-notification.com (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) May 2, 2007 Dear Administrative Contact: I am contacting you on behalf of AmTrust Bank. AmTrust Bank, a federal savings bank with headquarters located at 1801 East Ninth Street, Cleveland, Ohio 44114 (the "Bank"), is the owner of the AmTrust® and Ohio Savings® trademarks. The serial numbers and registrations of these marks with the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office are: AmTrust® serial number 73557900, registration number 1462208 Ohio Savings® serial number 75746900, registration number 2505819 The goods and services covered by or offered under these marks are retail banking services provided to the general public. I manage the Bank's Internet compliance program and have found certain specific advertisements or other uses that infringe upon one or both of these marks as shown below: http://www.1-mortgage-now.com/go/floridamortgageloan Bill Meyers, Loan Consultant uses OSB term to divert traffic to his site at http://www.marcoislandmortgage.com I am concerned that the content and key words used on these web pages are damaging the Bank's strong goodwill and reputation. The Bank operates nationwide by telephone and Internet banking and is one of the largest savings banks in the U.S., with assets over $18 billion. The Bank's business originated in 1889, over 118 years ago. The Bank has been using the AmTrust® mark in commerce since 1989 and the Ohio Savings® mark since before that. I have a good faith belief that use of these marks on the identified web pages is not authorized by the mark's owner or its agent, nor is such use permissible or defensible under law. Accordingly, I am asking that you remove all references to AmTrust® and/or Ohio Savings® from the identified web pages. I truly appreciate your prompt attention to this matter. Should you have any questions, please contact me at the e-mail address provided below. I hereby certify in good faith, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the mark's owner. Sincerely, Trademark Department AmTrust Bank Legal Administrator Legal Administrator [IFID:97NLD] MIME element (text/html)
May 2, 2007



Dear Administrative Contact:

I am contacting you on behalf of AmTrust Bank. AmTrust Bank, a federal savings bank with headquarters located at 1801 East Ninth Street, Cleveland, Ohio 44114 (the "Bank"), is the owner of the AmTrust® and Ohio Savings® trademarks. The serial numbers and registrations of these marks with the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office are:
AmTrust® serial number 73557900, registration number 1462208
Ohio Savings® serial number 75746900, registration number 2505819

The goods and services covered by or offered under these marks are retail banking services provided to the general public.

I manage the Bank's Internet compliance program and have found certain specific advertisements or other uses that infringe upon one or both of these marks as shown below:
http://www.1-mortgage-now.com/go/floridamortgageloan
Bill Meyers, Loan Consultant uses OSB term to divert traffic to his site at http://www.marcoislandmortgage.com

I am concerned that the content and key words used on these web pages are damaging the Bank's strong goodwill and reputation. The Bank operates nationwide by telephone and Internet banking and is one of the largest savings banks in the U.S., with assets over $18 billion. The Bank's business originated in 1889, over 118 years ago. The Bank has been using the AmTrust® mark in commerce since 1989 and the Ohio Savings® mark since before that. I have a good faith belief that use of these marks on the identified web pages is not authorized by the mark's owner or its agent, nor is such use permissible or defensible under law.

Accordingly, I am asking that you remove all references to AmTrust® and/or Ohio Savings® from the identified web pages. I truly appreciate your prompt attention to this matter. Should you have any questions, please contact me at the e-mail address provided below.

I hereby certify in good faith, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the mark's owner.

Sincerely,

Trademark Department
AmTrust Bank Legal Administrator


Legal Administrator <administrator-111@legal-notification.com>
[IFID:97NLD]
MIME element (text/plain)
